title: Tab and app focus issues with nightly 1.77.3 1784
author: Clumpton
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
When switching tabs in the app (with mouse) the tab that has the focus needs a mouse click in the window to actually get the focus.
This has changed since the 2019 release. 
Additionally, when MRng is behind another window, clicking in the visible area does not always bring it to the foreground.


## Expected Behavior
Clicking on a connection tab should select the connection and give it the focus.
